main event: A bright object was observed hovering the ground near Danville, Kentucky, on May 23, 1962. The object suddenly shot straight up and disappeared.
interesting points: The object was approximately 20 feet in diameter.
The observer, S/A William T. Tiller, was driving along U.S. Highway 150 when he saw the object.
Tiller was excited about the incident and showed no interest when the investigator attempted to question him further.
The document also includes several other sightings of unidentified aerial phenomena in the Columbus and Dayton, Ohio areas.
The sighting lasted for about 6 minutes.
sighted object: a bright object hovering the ground
